full_summary:
### K8D10-240431 ORBITRAP MASS SPECTROMETRY Tender

#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4311780907-Doc4314383772
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4311780907
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-17
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-19T14:00:00 (Amendment: 02:00 pm EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-03-15
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-04-01

#### Tender Description

The Government of Canada invites bids from pre-qualified suppliers under Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services, and supplies. This tender is reserved for holders of the aforementioned supply arrangement.

**Pre-Qualification Requirements**

To participate in this tender, suppliers must be pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI. Interested suppliers can register on the Canadian Government's procurement platform, CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba), and submit a response to the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D.

**Bid Requirements**

* Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time has been amended to 2023-12-19 at 02:00 pm EST.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the new closing time.
* Late bids will not be evaluated.

#### Contracting Entity

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Fernandez, Allison (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Pre-Qualification Information**: Suppliers can pre-qualify on Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI by registering on CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba)

#### Notice URL

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18042604?extsite=MTgwNDI2MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that this rewritten entry aims to maintain the original content and structure of the text while improving its clarity,
